thread.title: 'My 600-lb Life' Star Worries That Her Husband Is 'Upset' She's Trying to Lose Weight
thread.title_full: 'My 600-lb Life' Star Worries That Her Husband Is 'Upset' She's Trying to Lose Weight

title: 'My 600-lb Life' Star Worries That Her Husband Is 'Upset' She's Trying to Lose Weight
text:
Beauty of the Day: 5 Secrets of Taraji P. Henson's Style 
Anthony says in a testimonial, "We need each other, we support each other, even in the bad times. But if Tracey wants to do this, then she needs to learn to do this herself." And Tracey adds to the camera, "I don't know why he's having issues helping me, but if things keep changing between us, I'm scared about what that's going to mean. It just makes me feel lonely because I can't do this without him." Failed Reality TV Romances 
Watch the clip above. My 600-lb Life airs on TLC Wednesdays at 8 p.m. ET.
